title: every single sims 3 expansion
description:
These torrents are not originally for me i did this to make it easier for those who enjoy collecting expansions by compressing it into one big download

I installed this with the 1.55.4 update, and tested it with such, 
if your copy is legit i suggest going to sku version in your sims 3 base game folder in 
programfiles>Electronic Arts>sims 3>game>bin, changing the sku version to 1 then installing 
the patch and all these expansions in order(i have numbered them accordingly), 
then go ahead and update if you wish or keep it the way it is
if it is a illegitimate copy then do the exact same thing and acquire a crack for the base game
for update 1.55.4 specifically, failure to do so will result in the game not working, at all
most of the expansions come with their own installation guide and keys, if it does not have
a key then look one up on pirate bay, i have tested these all out and they work perfectly fine
any comments post on pirate bay

installation steps: 1. unrar twice(once to see the expansions and a second for the      actual expansion
2.scroll down to the setup(the prefix should be sp0, or ep0) and use that
3.use keys or keygens that are in the installation guide or in a folder

please seed, because after a couple months or so, depending on torrent seeding, i will stop
